commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Wait, Chika! Ruby!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm sorry, Rin!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ruuunnn!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Good grief. Rin! Please chase after them!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Huh? What's going on?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: We'll explain later! Please just catch the two of them!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Got it! I have no idea what's going on, but I'll go!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: It's not good to run in the halls, but...this seems like an emergency, and I have Umi's permission, so I'm gonna crank it to the max!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Chika, Ruby, I'm gonna get you!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: G-Good luck. I don't really understand what's happening, either.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You've really done it now, Chika. I won't let you get away!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I-I think we're safe now that we've made it this far.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Huff* *Pant* Wh-Why were we running?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: If we had stayed, she would've lectured us until evening. I think she'll be calmer when scolding us if we just give her some time.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: But we're going to get in trouble either way? Ugh, this is definitely going to backfire. Maybe we should go back and...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hold up. I hear something. What's that thumping noise?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Wait, are those footsteps? I think I hear yelling, too...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Chiiikaaa! Ruuubyyy! Fooouuund yooouuu!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Aaaggghhh!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eeek! N-Nooo! Wait for me, Chika!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I won't let you get away!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Huff* *Pant* I-I can't believe she found us so fast!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Aaahhh! Rin... Rin's eyes! They were glowing like a cat's! I'm scared!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What should we do? Which way should we run? Oh, Ruby, over here!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: In this empty classroom?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Let's stay here for a while. Rin is fast, so it's probably better to hide somewhere than to try and outrun her.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: M-Makes sense.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm sure she'll give up if she can't find...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Heeeeeeere's Rin!

commands.speaker: Chika, Ruby
commands.line: Chika: Gaaahhh! Ruby: Eeek!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Giggle* Are we playing hide-and-seek now instead of tag?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: R-R-Ruuunnn!
